channel.title: How do i get the amount of arrows in the equipment slot?
channel.description:
How can i get the amount of arrows?
[img]http://s18.postimage.org/nd3ae0wg9/SPEC_433.png[/img]

item.title: How do i get the amount of arrows in the equipment slot?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“pkkid, post:3, topic:473464”]lets say I’ve got 1000 rune arrows in my arrow slot.
How do I get the number 1000?
Because I need the number for my deposit equipment button

c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows] will only return the id and not the amount?[/quote]
‘playerEquipmentN[c.playerArrows]’

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get the amount of arrows in the equipment slot?
